## FormsPathMapping() function

**Signature:**

```typescript
FormsPathMapping: (components: (Class<any> | Component)[]) => (_comp_: Class<FormsModule>) => void
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  components | ([Class](./forms42core.class.md)<!-- -->&lt;any&gt; \| [Component](./forms42core.component.md)<!-- -->)\[\] | <p>: A list of components and their mapping</p><p>HTML is pure text and often FutureForms needs to know how to translate a given path/name into a class. This is done by injecting the class and a path/name into the FutureForms engine.</p> |
